text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I'm not a Buzzfeed fan, but the studies mentioned in this article, although 'questionable', may elude to a bigger truth about Covid mortality rates in line with the common flu:
https://t.co/Gm0jhXL9zo
